A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It has a tons of flaws and it's not a terrible movie\, it's just... Okay. I wish I could say it's underrated entry of the series\, but despite it Carrie Fisher's last film to go out on with some memorable lines\, John Williams score and the action was very good. In other way\, I may find this a disappointing\, it should being a hell a lot better
